SEARCH
Package model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Represents the inventory for a specific medicine in a hospital management system. Includes details about stock availability, alert levels, stock status, and replenishment request status.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Inventory.RequestStatus
    Enum representing the status of a replenishment request.
    static enum 
    Inventory.Status
    Enum representing the stock status of a medicine.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory(String name, int stockAvailable, int alertLevel)
      Constructs a new Inventory object for a specific medicine. Initializes the stock status as 'SUFFICIENT' and the request status as 'NULL'.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the medicine.
      stockAvailable - the initial stock available.
      alertLevel - the stock level at which alerts should be triggered.

  • Method Details

    • updateStock

      public boolean updateStock()
      Updates the stock by reducing it by one unit if available. Triggers a low stock alert if the stock reaches the alert level.
      Returns:
      true if the stock was successfully updated; false if the stock is unavailable.

    • lowStockAlert

      private void lowStockAlert()
      Checks if the stock has reached or dropped below the alert level. Updates the status to 'LOW' and prints a low stock alert if applicable.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      the medicine name.

    • getStock

      public int getStock()
      Retrieves the current stock available for the medicine.
      Returns:
      the current stock available.

    • setStock

      public void setStock(int newStock)
      Updates the stock available for the medicine.
      Parameters:
      newStock - the new stock level to set.

    • getStatus

      public Inventory.Status getStatus()
      Retrieves the current stock status of the medicine.
      Returns:
      the current stock status.

    • getreqStatus

      public Inventory.RequestStatus getreqStatus()
      Retrieves the current replenishment request status.
      Returns:
      the current request status.

    • getAlertLevel

      public int getAlertLevel()
      Retrieves the alert level for low stock.
      Returns:
      the low stock alert level.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(Inventory.Status status)
      Sets the current stock status of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      status - the new stock status to set.

    • setreqStatus

      public void setreqStatus(Inventory.RequestStatus reqStatus)
      Sets the current replenishment request status.
      Parameters:
      reqStatus - the new request status to set.

    • setAlertLevel

      public void setAlertLevel(int alertLevel)
      Sets a new alert level for low stock.
      Parameters:
      alertLevel - the new alert level to set.

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the details of the inventory, including the medicine name, stock available, stock status, and replenishment request status.
